featured.text: Many times nowadays, it is the children who teach the songs to their parents, putting back the pieces of a blurred memory.”
What does “the pieces of a blurred memory” in the third paragraph most likely refer to? (A)

definition.zh_def: 模糊的，無法清晰辨認的
definition.en_def: Not clear or distinct; lacking sharpness or clarity.
definition.example: The photograph was blurred, making it hard to see the details.
